channel.title: Posts on fromgate.me
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on fromgate.me

item.title: Released Weatherman v1.1.0
item.description:
Released new version of my bukkit plugin WeatherMan v1.1.0.

Changelog
  • Added Local Time feature. Now you can create time specific for player, region, biome or world.
  • Internal recode and optimization
  • Updated to craftbukkit/spigot 1.11.x
New commands:
  • /wtm player [<player> <HH:MM|day|night|remove>] — configure player personal time
  • /wtm region [<region> <HH:MM|day|night|remove>] — configure local region time
  • /wtm biome [<biome> <HH:MM|day|night|remove>] — configure local biome time
  • /wtm world [<world> <HH:MM|day|night|remove>] — configure local world time

Download

item.title: Translations for Minecraft v3.1.0
item.description:
New version of application Translations for Minecraft uploaded to GooglePlay.

Now it trying to apply installed resource packs and choose correct language in game menu.

And I must say “Thank you” to Drake Strike, who translated application to Vietnamese and made a greate contribution with translationg missed MCPE messages.

item.title: MCPE 1.0.3 beta released
item.description:
Today released new beta build for Minecraft Pocket Edition (Android).
This version contains new command “servertransfer” and messages that reveals name of resourcepack that will added in the next version: “Candy”. d You can find all message (and help them translate) on translate.fromgate.me

item.title: Translations project got new url
item.description: I noticed that Crowdin allows to use custom url for translations projects. And now Translations for Minecraft has new url: http://translate.fromgate.me

item.title: Video about app Translations for Minecraft
item.description:
After receiving some negative (one star) feedback on the GooglePlay, I found that some users of my application did not understood how it works.

So I created a small video to demonstrate how to use my application.

item.title: fromgate.me - Welcome back!
item.description: Hello! I’m going to recreate this blog - fromgate.me. I’m planning to make it something like my Russian http://fromgate.ru.
